snippet: New York City’s heat was so intense on Tuesday night that the Philharmonic shortened its final free outdoor concert in the Bronx.
abstract: Heat wave in New York City leads New York Philharmonic to shorten its final free outdoor concert in Van Cortland Park in the Bronx.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s heat was so intense on Tuesday night that the Philharmonic shortened its final free outdoor concert in the Bronx.

headline.main: Dvorak Is One Casualty of the City’s Heat Wave
headline.print_headline: Dvorak Is One Casualty Of the City’s Heat Wave
